column1: Uchi////My wife made a reservation for our Anniversary this year.  She booked through OpenTable
column2: and of course received a confirmation email.  We arrived 30 minuted before our reservation time and were greeted at the front desk.  The young lady looked and looked but could not find our reservation.  Being an iPhone user
column3: my wife promptly looked up her confirmation email from OpenTable.  In the process she also discovered an email that had been sent from Uchi confirming her reservation for another date
column5: she showed both emails to the girls at the reception desk and tried to explain that this was a special occasion.  Their response was
column7: we should be able to seat you in 2-3 hours.  They made ABSOLUTELY ZERO effort to accommodate in light of what appeared to be a technical issue that originated with Uchi.
